product_name: Brooks Nightlife LSD Lite Jacket III - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A packable, weather-resistant and ultralight jacket for training runs in any setting, the women's Brooks Nightlife L.S.D. Lite III jacket is easy to bring along when the weather is unpredictable.
short_description: A packable, weather-resistant and ultralight jacket for training runs in any setting, the women's Brooks Nightlife L.S.D. Lite III jacket is easy to bring along when the weather is unpredictable.
